event.title: I Love Free Software Day in Frankfurt, Germany

body.p: The local FSFE group Rhein-Main will throw an "I Love Free Software Day" party with all Free Software enthusiasts near Frankfurt am Main. On â€˜I Love Free Software Dayâ€™, we reach out to all those amazing people behind Free Software and recognize their work by saying â€˜Thank you â™¥â€™.
